author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

New Validation tool for HGCal Geometry from Imran Yusuff

#### PR validation:

Tested for the 2026D83 Geometry using cmsRun testHGCalWaferVallidation_cfg.py geometry=D83

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx287V New Validation tool for HGCal Geometry from Imran Yusuff
